alert.note: Alert for Geary; Morris; Pottawatomie; Riley; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 8:02AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geary, southern Riley, northwestern Morris, northwestern Wabaunsee and western Pottawatomie Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 801 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Milford to 5 miles south of Grandview Plaza to near White City. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Alma, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, St. George, White City, Milford, Dwight, Olsburg, Milford Lake, Keats, Tuttle Creek Lake and Volland. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 293 and 326. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
